data.name: AssemblyDescription
data.value: MSBuild SonarQube Runner Pre-processor

data.name: CmdLine_ArgDescription_InstallTargets
data.value: /install:[true|false] - install standard MSBuild targets required for analysis (default true)

data.name: CmdLine_ArgDescription_ProjectKey
data.value: /key:[SonarQube project key]

data.name: CmdLine_ArgDescription_ProjectName
data.value: /name:[SonarQube project name]

data.name: CmdLine_ArgDescription_ProjectVersion
data.value: /version:[SonarQube project version]

data.name: DIAG_SavingConfigFile
data.value: Saving the config file to {0}

data.name: ERROR_Args_UrlRequired
data.value: The SonarQube URL must be supplied. The URL can be specified in a settings file or on the command line (e.g. using /d:sonar.host.url=http://myserver:9000).

data.name: ERROR_CannotPerformProcessing
data.value: SonarQube pre-processing cannot be performed - required settings are missing

data.name: ERROR_CmdLine_InvalidInstallTargetsValue
data.value: Invalid value for /install: {0}. Valid values are "true" or "false".

data.name: ERROR_DuplicateCheckId
data.value: The following CheckId should not appear multiple times: {0}

data.name: ERROR_InvalidCommandLineArgs
data.value: Expecting at least three command line arguments: - SonarQube project key - SonarQube project name - SonarQube project version The full path to a settings file can also be supplied. If it is not supplied, the exe will attempt to locate a default settings file in the same directory as the MSBuild.SonarQube.Runner.

data.name: ERROR_InvalidProjectKeyArg
data.value: Invalid project key. Allowed characters are alphanumeric, '-', '_', '.' and ':', with at least one non-digit.

data.name: ERROR_MissingSetting
data.value: Missing analysis setting: {0}

data.name: ERROR_WebException
data.value: An error occured while trying to connect to the SonarQube server. Please check that the web server is accessible. Url {0}

data.name: MSG_CreatingFolders
data.value: Creating config and output folders...

data.name: MSG_FetchingAnalysisConfiguration
data.value: Fetching analysis configuration settings...

data.name: MSG_FetchingProjectProperties
data.value: Fetching properties for project '{0}' from {1}...

data.name: MSG_GeneratingRuleset
data.value: Generating the FxCop ruleset: {0}

data.name: MSG_GeneratingRulesets
data.value: Generating rulesets...

data.name: MSG_InstallTargets_Copy
data.value: Installed {0} to {1}

data.name: MSG_InstallTargets_Overwrite
data.value: The file {0} was overwritten at {1}

data.name: MSG_InstallTargets_UpToDate
data.value: The file {0} is up to date at {1}

data.value: Skipping installing the ImportsBefore targets file

data.name: MSG_UpdatingMSBuildTargets
data.value: Updating build integration targets...

data.name: SLAP_CSharpPluginNotInstalled
data.value: C# plugin is not installed so the SonarLint ruleset cannot be retrieved

data.name: SLAP_FetchingSonarLintRuleset
data.value: Fetching the SonarLint ruleset from the server...

data.name: SLAP_InvalidRulesetReturned
data.value: The SonarQube server did returned an invalid ruleset for SonarLint

data.name: SLAP_NoProfileForProject
data.value: Could not obtain a C# profile for project '{0}'

data.name: SLAP_ProfileExportFound
data.value: Found SonarLint profile export for project '{0}'

data.name: SLAP_ProfileExportNotFound
data.value: Could not find SonarLint profile export for project '{0}'

data.name: SLAP_SonarLintRulesetCreated
data.value: SonarLint ruleset downloaded: {0}

data.name: WARN_ExistingGlobalTargets
data.value: This version of the MSBuild SonarQube Runner automatically deploys {0}, however a copy has been found in {1}. Please remove it if it is not intentional.
